title: File Number 404: Ek Adhoori Dastavez
description:
14 March 2018 ko, ek sarkari daftar se Aarohi Sharma gayab ho gayi. Police records mein sirf ek file number tha: 404.
Yeh kahani us aakhri file ki hai, aur us shaks ki, jo jaanta tha ki kuch raaz daftar ki deewaron se zyada gehre the.
Kuch sawaal hamesha adhoore reh jaate hain, aur kuch sach sirf kagazon mein dafan hote hain.

scenes.imagePrompt: A dimly lit, dusty government archive room in Delhi. Focus on a single man (Rohan, mid-30s, tired eyes) sitting alone at a wooden desk, illuminated only by a weak table lamp. He is staring intently at an old, thick, brown file folder labeled '404'. The air is heavy with silence and dust motes floating in the light.
scenes.imageToVideoPrompt:
A slow, deliberate push-in shot on the man's face, then shifting focus to the file labeled '404'. The camera is handheld, barely moving, creating a sense of heavy stillness. Ambient sound of distant city traffic and the rustle of old paper.
Dialogue (calm, documentary narration):
“यहाँ पर कहानी शुरू नहीं होती…
असल में, यहाँ पर कहानी टूटती है…
Records ke mutaabik, 14 March 2018 ko, Aarohi Sharma ne apni desk chhod di. Lekin police file mein sirf ek entry thi: File Number 404. Yeh wohi file thi jise woh aakhri baar padh rahi thi.”
End with silence, not music.

scenes.imagePrompt: A deserted, rain-slicked railway platform (Platform Number 3) at night in Mumbai. The yellow sodium lamps cast long, lonely shadows. Two empty tea cups sit on a wet, rusted bench. The atmosphere is melancholic and secretive.
scenes.imageToVideoPrompt:
A slow, panning shot across the empty platform, focusing briefly on the two abandoned tea cups. Subtle environmental motion of light reflecting off the wet tracks and the sound of distant, slow-moving train wheels and light rain.
Dialogue (calm, documentary narration):
“Log aaj bhi is par baat nahi karte, ki woh dono sirf 'colleagues' nahi the. Unki mulaqaatein hamesha is purane railway station ke platform number teen par hoti thi. Aur unki baatein, hamesha un files ke baare mein thi, jinhe chhoona mana tha. Yeh woh jagah thi jahan unka rishta shuru hua, aur shayad khatam bhi.”
End with silence, not music.

scenes.imagePrompt: A close-up of a heavily sealed, unmarked steel door in a forgotten corridor of a large, brutalist government building. The door has several layers of old, official wax seals and a small, faded handwritten note taped near the handle, almost illegible. Moody, low-key lighting.
scenes.imageToVideoPrompt:
A slow, deliberate tilt-up shot, starting from the floor of the corridor and ending on the sealed steel door. The camera holds steady on the seals. The only sound is the faint, echoing drip of water somewhere nearby.
Dialogue (calm, documentary narration):
“Rohan jaanta tha ki 404 sirf ek number nahi tha. Yeh ek code tha. Us saal ke baad sab kuch badal gaya. Yeh woh aakhri jagah thi jiska zikr Aarohi ne kiya tha. Woh darwaza aaj bhi band hai. Aur uske peeche kya hai, yeh sirf Aarohi jaanti thi. Ya shayad, koi nahi.”
End with silence, not music.
